meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Gould Judy Anderson Cathy Whitehead Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4121.

td.p: Tom Gould, a software developer from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Judy Anderson, a mortgage banker originally from Savannah, Georgia
Cathy Whitehead, a homemaker from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,600)

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
LET'S GO EAT
HOW ABOUT A REVIVAL?
WILD WEST TALK
(Alex: The entire category is about the famous painting.)
(Alex: And in the spirit of '76, we have...)
RED, WHITE OR BLUE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In the spring and summer, a million bats gather under the Congress Avenue Bridge in this "Lone Star State" capital')

tr.td: In the spring and summer, a million bats gather under the Congress Avenue Bridge in this "Lone Star State" capital

tr.td: Cathy
Judy
Tom
SONNETS
G-MEN & WOMEN
ANNIVERSARY GIFTS
MED CENTER
(Alex: This is a reference to the Mediterranean, not medical stuff.)
GUINNESS SPORTS RECORDS
DIACRITICAL MARKS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [After reading the clue.] 35...30 seconds, not 35 seconds.)
---
(Alex: [After revealing Cathy\'s response.] The Marx Brothers, you\'re right.)
CathyWhat is A Night at the Opera?
$7,200
TomWhat was What\'s c
$1,900
JudyWhat is A Night At the Opera?
$8,001
A Night at the Opera')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
